english.segment1: FROM HEAVEN YOU CAME, Helpless babe, Entered our world, Your glory veiled;. Not to be served. But to serve, And give Your life. That we might live.
english.segment2: This is our God, The Servant King, He calls us now. To follow Him, To bring our lives. As a daily offering. Of worship to. The Servant King.
english.segment3: There in the garden. Of tears, My heavy load. He chose to bear;. His heart with sorrow. Was torn, 'Yet not My will. But Yours,' He said.
english.segment4: Come see His hands. And His feet, The scars that speak. Of sacrifice;. Hands that flung stars. Into space. To cruel nails. Surrendered.
english.segment5: So let us learn. How to serve, And in our lives. Enthrone Him;. Each other's needs. To prefer, For it is Christ. We're serving.
